metadata.title: CVE-2018-5711 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
gd_gif_in.c in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd), as used in PHP before5.6.33, 7.0.x before 7.0.27, 7.1.x before 7.1.13, and 7.2.x before 7.2.1,has an integer signedness error that leads to an infinite loop via acrafted GIF file, as demonstrated by a call to the imagecreatefromgif orimagecreatefromstring PHP function. This is related to GetCode_ andgdImageCreateFromGifCtx.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5711` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2').
